amendment.description: An amendment numbered 99 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to plan for, begin, continue, finish, process, or approve the relocation of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's Marine Operations Center-Pacific from Seattle, Washington, to Newport, Oregon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McDermott amendment (A112) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 333 (Roll no. 112).
